amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 as en bloc No. 5: Nos. 8, 15, 47, 63, 84, 85, 96, 113, 115, 116, 126, 127, 128, 130, 147, and 167.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A005) offered by Mr. Calvert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
